name: Layton
content:
Layton was a Human male smuggler who operated out of Varykino during the Galactic Civil War.
Layton was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Layton was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
